name: NotTheHero
description:
Godot Wild Jam entry may 2021

Theme: You are not the hero.

You are a squire being protected by your knight. The knight slays all enemies and you pick up all the loot. 

WASD movement, use ESC to exit inventory screen.

My first ever submission in a game jam, learning Godot as I go.

No time for:

  • Actually using the loot to upgrade the knight
  • No win or loose condition
  • Animation
